title: Abergwili fatal house fire not suspicious, police say
article: A man has died following a house fire in the early hours of Sunday. Dyfed-Powys Police said the blaze at the property in Abergwili, near Carmarthen, was reported at 06:35 GMT. The man who died is believed to be in his 70s, and the house is being made safe for investigators to find out what caused the fire.However, is not being treated as suspicious.
